Articles.Content:
As a first note, my game was working fine earlier this week, which makes this issue even stranger since it seemed to happen over night.

Upon loading a save game, or when creating a brand new campaign, the game will run for a few seconds and then freeze. The freeze is permanent and requires Task Manager to close the window.

I have tried re-installing the game (including the process of fully deleting the LocalRoaming KSP2 files and the Steam Common files), ad have tried validating game files- all to no change.

My only semi-success in fixing the bug was in forcing a DirectX Runtime re-install and a Virtual Studio C++ re-install, and then restarting my computer. Seemed to fix the issue for all of thirty minutes before it started happening again.

I am running the game in Administrator Mode, and am using the .exe file to skip the Launcher. Issue persists if I remove these parameters.

All my drivers are up to date.

My computer specs:

  • Windows 11 Pro
  • i9-13900k
  • 4070 ti
  • 64gb RAM
